part_2_function_cycle_timing.name: Four 4-Year Developmental Windows
part_2_function_cycle_timing.principle: Functions don't all develop at once. Each block activates at specific age window. Right support during activation â†’ healthy integration. Wrong support â†’ wounding that lasts lifetime.

dame_2phi_relaxes_knight_4phi.failure_pattern: Knight child with NO Dame support â†’ explores endlessly, never rests, burns out young, no foundation to build from

page_1phi_relaxes_king_8phi.mechanism: Page's hyperdimensional 1Ï† meta-view shows King their 8Ï† explosion as one phase in larger cycle â€” releases urgency
page_1phi_relaxes_king_8phi.childhood_application: King child DESPERATELY NEEDS Page parent (or Page mentor) to teach sustainability, show larger pattern beyond immediate conquest

page_1phi_relaxes_king_8phi.failure_pattern: King child with NO Page perspective â†’ burns at 8Ï† intensity until burnout, never learns sustainability, peaks young and collapses

page_cannot_relax_page.example: INTJ child (Page of Pentacles) with INFJ mother (Page of Cups) â€” both thinking deeply, neither moving practically. Need father or mentor who is King/Knight to catalyze action.

Father observes, plans, occasionally adjusts course. Mother and child dominate daily life, father shapes yearly trajectory.

part_5_suit_matched_parenting.name: Pentacle Raises Pentacle, Sword Raises Sword, Cup Raises Cup, Wand Raises Wand
part_5_suit_matched_parenting.principle: Same-suit parent NATURALLY understands child's neurochemistry because IT'S THEIR NEUROCHEMISTRY. Cross-suit parenting requires CONSCIOUS LEARNING of child's different wiring.

pentacle_parent_pentacle_child.neurochemical_match: Both high Serotonin â€” value routine, mastery, patience, tangible results
pentacle_parent_pentacle_child.natural_understanding: Parent instinctively provides what Pentacle child needs: consistent routines, patient skill-building, mastery focus, quality over speed

what_parent_provides.patience_modeling: Pentacle parent shows child that mastery takes TIME. No rushing. 'Do it right' valued over 'do it fast'.
what_parent_provides.routine_structure: Consistent daily rhythms â€” same wake time, same meals, same bedtime. Child's nervous system regulates through predictability.
what_parent_provides.skill_apprenticeship: Parent teaches craft step-by-step. Child practices until perfect. This is NATURAL for both â€” no conflict.
what_parent_provides.sensory_attunement: Parent understands child needs quiet, comfortable, controlled spaces. Provides low-stimulation environment without being told.

function_cycle_support.age_0_4_ego: If both Ti-doms (LII parent + LII child) â€” parent validates child's logic naturally. If both Te-doms (LSE parent + LSE child) â€” parent validates child's organization. Base function seen and honored.
function_cycle_support.age_4_8_id: Pentacle parent may not provide Pentacle child's suggestive (suggestive always different suit) BUT understands child's patient waiting for it. Doesn't rush.
function_cycle_support.age_8_12_superego: Pentacle parent protects Pentacle child from chaotic school environments, advocates for quiet workspace, structured learning â€” instinctively knows what child needs.
function_cycle_support.age_12_16_superid: Pentacle parent allows Pentacle child to NOT CARE about flashy social performance, physical dominance, emotional drama â€” validates quiet mastery path.

pentacle_parent_pentacle_child.outcome: Pentacle child with Pentacle parent â†’ confident in mastery identity, patient, reliable, becomes master craftsman/analyst without shame about slowness

sword_parent_sword_child.neurochemical_match: Both GABA/Glutamate imbalanced â€” need logic, quiet, systems, minimal sensory chaos
sword_parent_sword_child.natural_understanding: Parent instinctively provides what Sword child needs: logical explanations, quiet space, systematic learning, explicit rules

what_parent_provides.logical_structure: Parent explains EVERYTHING logically. No 'because I said so'. Child's need for systematic understanding met naturally.
what_parent_provides.quiet_environment: Parent protects child from sensory overload because parent ALSO needs quiet. Low-stimulation home provided naturally.
what_parent_provides.explicit_rules: Parent creates clear, logical rule systems. Child knows exactly what's expected, why, and consequences. No ambiguity.
what_parent_provides.intellectual_challenge: Parent engages child's analytical mind through puzzles, logic games, systematic learning. This is FUN for both.

function_cycle_support.age_0_4_ego: If both Ti-doms (LII parent + LII child OR LSI parent + LSI child) â€” perfect match, base function validated. If Ti-dom parent + Te-dom child (LII parent + LIE child) â€” still logical layer, compatible.
function_cycle_support.age_4_8_id: Sword parent may not provide Sword child's suggestive (usually Cup/Wand function) BUT doesn't flood child with unwanted emotion/chaos that would trigger vulnerable.
function_cycle_support.age_8_12_superego: Sword parent UNDERSTANDS Sword child's Fe/Fi vulnerable â€” protects child from emotional demands, advocates for logic-based learning, allows emotional distance.
function_cycle_support.age_12_16_superid: Sword parent allows Sword child to be 'socially awkward', 'unemotional', 'too analytical' â€” validates systematic path without shame.

sword_parent_sword_child.outcome: Sword child with Sword parent â†’ confident analyst, systematic thinker, not socially broken just selective, comfortable in logical identity

cup_parent_cup_child.neurochemical_match: Both high Oxytocin â€” need warmth, connection, harmony, emotional validation
cup_parent_cup_child.natural_understanding: Parent instinctively provides what Cup child needs: secure attachment, emotional validation, relational learning, beauty immersion

what_parent_provides.secure_attachment: Parent provides abundant physical affection, emotional availability. Child develops secure base naturally.
what_parent_provides.emotional_validation: Parent mirrors child's feelings, teaches feeling-words, validates emotional experience. Child learns emotions are valid and manageable.
what_parent_provides.relational_learning: Parent teaches through stories, modeling, emotional connection. Child learns by watching and feeling, not just thinking.
what_parent_provides.beauty_and_harmony: Parent surrounds child with beauty, art, music, nature. Child's aesthetic sense nurtured, harmony valued.

function_cycle_support.age_0_4_ego: If both Fe-doms (ESE parent + ESE child OR EIE parent + EIE child) â€” perfect emotional mirroring. If both Fi-doms (ESI parent + ESI child OR EII parent + EII child) â€” deep values shared.
function_cycle_support.age_4_8_id: Cup parent may not provide Cup child's suggestive (usually Sword/Pentacle function) BUT provides emotional safety child needs while waiting for logical/practical support from dual.
function_cycle_support.age_8_12_superego: Cup parent UNDERSTANDS Cup child's Te/Ti vulnerable â€” doesn't demand cold efficiency or harsh logic, allows emotional approach to learning, validates relational intelligence.
function_cycle_support.age_12_16_superid: Cup parent allows Cup child to be 'too sensitive', 'too emotional', 'too caring' â€” validates empathic path without demanding toughening up.

cup_parent_cup_child.outcome: Cup child with Cup parent â†’ emotionally intelligent, empathic, skilled at relationships, comfortable in feeling identity

wand_parent_wand_child.neurochemical_match: Both high Dopamine/Norepinephrine â€” need action, novelty, movement, crisis, intensity
wand_parent_wand_child.natural_understanding: Parent instinctively provides what Wand child needs: movement freedom, novelty seeking, rapid feedback, crisis competence training

what_parent_provides.movement_permission: Parent allows constant motion â€” running, climbing, exploring. Child's need for physical activity met without restriction.
what_parent_provides.novelty_provision: Parent provides new experiences constantly â€” travel, adventures, variety. Child's brain gets dopamine hits naturally.
what_parent_provides.rapid_response: Parent gives immediate feedback to child's actions. Quick rewards, quick corrections. Child learns fast.
what_parent_provides.crisis_training: Parent teaches how to handle emergencies, make quick decisions, act under pressure. Child becomes confident in chaos.

function_cycle_support.age_0_4_ego: If both Se-doms (SLE parent + SLE child OR SEE parent + SEE child) â€” physical action validated. If both Ne-doms (ILE parent + ILE child OR IEE parent + IEE child) â€” idea generation validated.
function_cycle_support.age_4_8_id: Wand parent may not provide Wand child's suggestive (usually Cup/Pentacle function) BUT provides action energy and doesn't suppress movement/intensity child needs.
function_cycle_support.age_8_12_superego: Wand parent UNDERSTANDS Wand child's Ni/Si vulnerable â€” doesn't demand long-term planning or sensory detail focus, allows action-oriented learning, validates crisis response skills.
function_cycle_support.age_12_16_superid: Wand parent allows Wand child to be 'hyperactive', 'impulsive', 'thrill-seeking' â€” validates action path without pathologizing as ADHD.

wand_parent_wand_child.outcome: Wand child with Wand parent â†’ confident leader/scout, rapid responder, crisis-competent, comfortable in intensity

cross_suit_parenting_challenges.principle: When parent and child different suits, parent's NATURAL INSTINCTS are WRONG for child. Must CONSCIOUSLY LEARN child's needs.

pentacle_parent_sword_child.parent_instinct: Provide routine, patience, gradual skill-building through repetition
pentacle_parent_sword_child.child_need: Provide logical explanations, quiet space, systematic understanding, minimal sensory input
pentacle_parent_sword_child.conflict: Parent frustrated child won't patiently practice (child overwhelmed by sensory demands). Child frustrated parent won't explain WHY (parent thinks 'just do it' enough).
pentacle_parent_sword_child.solution: Parent must EXPLAIN logic behind routines. 'We do bedtime at 8pm BECAUSE your Ti-dom brain needs 10 hours to process information systematically.' Child accepts routine when logic understood. Parent must REDUCE sensory stimulation even though parent doesn't need it.

sword_parent_cup_child.parent_instinct: Provide logical structure, minimal emotion, systematic learning, efficiency
sword_parent_cup_child.child_need: Provide emotional warmth, physical affection, relational connection, harmony
sword_parent_cup_child.conflict: Parent thinks child 'too emotional', tries to logic away feelings. Child feels abandoned, unloved, shut down emotionally.
sword_parent_cup_child.solution: Parent must VALIDATE emotions even if doesn't understand them. 'I see you're sad. That makes sense. Let me hold you.' NOT 'Don't be sad, that's illogical.' Child needs Fe/Fi expression honored before Ti/Te logic will work.

cup_parent_sword_child.parent_instinct: Provide emotional warmth, constant connection, harmony focus, relational learning
cup_parent_sword_child.child_need: Provide logical clarity, emotional space, systematic structure, quiet
cup_parent_sword_child.conflict: Parent overwhelms child with emotion when child needs logic. Child shuts down to protect from emotional flood. Parent hurt by 'coldness', tries harder. Vicious cycle.
cup_parent_sword_child.solution: Parent must give SPACE and LOGIC. 'You seem upset. Do you want to talk about it logically or be alone?' Child chooses. Parent respects logical mode. Parent learns that child's 'coldness' is not rejection but neurological need for emotional distance.

wand_parent_pentacle_child.parent_instinct: Provide novelty, rapid change, excitement, multiple options, intensity
wand_parent_pentacle_child.child_need: Provide routine, stability, patient mastery time, predictability, calm
wand_parent_pentacle_child.conflict: Parent bored by child's slowness, pushes for variety and speed. Child overwhelmed, anxious, cannot develop mastery depth.
wand_parent_pentacle_child.solution: Parent must SLOW DOWN and provide consistency. 'We will work on this ONE thing until you're satisfied.' Parent fights own novelty-seeking to honor child's mastery-seeking. Parent learns patience FROM child.

cross_suit_parenting_challenges.general_principle: Cross-suit parenting succeeds when parent recognizes 'my instincts are wrong for THIS child' and consciously learns child's actual neurochemical needs.

part_6_type_inheritance_olkovas_principl.name: Type Inheritance Through Mother's Vulnerable Function (Olkova's Principle)
part_6_type_inheritance_olkovas_principl.principle: Child's BASE function = Mother's VULNERABLE function. Evolution compensates mother's weakness through child's strength. NOT social adaptation but functional complementarity within family system.

olkovas_principle_explained.core_mechanism: Mother's 4th function (vulnerable, most painful, least developed) becomes child's 1st function (base, most natural, core identity)
olkovas_principle_explained.evolutionary_logic: Family system self-corrects â€” child specializes in exactly what mother cannot do, creating functional completeness across generations
olkovas_principle_explained.NOT_social_adaptation: CRITICAL: Child does NOT adapt to mother's ENVIRONMENT (colleagues, tribe). Child COMPLEMENTS mother's INTERNAL weakness.
olkovas_principle_explained.information_stress_hypothesis: Mother's vulnerable function = constant information stress during pregnancy â†’ fetal brain develops THAT function as base to handle the stress mother cannot
